payment_page.description1: By continuing you agree that if you don't cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the 7-days trial, you will be automatically charged {{formattedPrice}} every month until you cancel by contacting our support team. Learn more about cancellation and refund policy in Subscription terms.
payment_page.select_plan_title: Select plan that best work for you
payment_page.variant_c_refund_description_1: After 7 days and when your trial period expires, your monthly subscription will automatically be renew at $49.99, billed every 30 days. You can cancel at any time.

review1.name: Patrick
review1.content: Thank you for this website. I enjoyed it. It's handy for converting or erasing some parts of a document.
review1.title: Love it!

review2.name: Tom
review2.content: It's easy to use and convert PDFs to PowerPoint sheets. I needed such a platform to do my work...to edit PDFs and convert. I recommend it.
review2.title: Quick and Easy

review3.name: Julia
review3.content: The website was very easy to navigate and I was able to convert my PDF to Word. The experience was good. It makes a much easier flow than other services.
review3.title: Easy to use

review4.name: Douglas
review4.content: I like converting PDF to JPG because it comes out with the same quality without any flaws. I hope the website developers keep working so we can keep enjoying this great site.
review4.title: A great site for converting PDF

review5.name: Martha
review5.content:
I used website as a study tool and for work. It is easy-to-use. You can modify your PDF files, resize, and convert to Word documents... It saved me lots of time and nerves.
    I highly recommend you check them out
review5.title: PdfMaster is really a master!
